name: MBlue Nav-Buttons Vista on XP
description:
MBlue Nav-Buttons Vista on XP
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
 Makes the Back-Forward Buttons like Vista buttons, on XP.
 Supports both small and large icons.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes:
-Using this on Vista is completely useless.

-Can be used to replace the Back-Forward buttons with the VISTA buttons when using different Themes.

-When using THEMES/EXTENSIONS/STYLES that changes some margins, you may need to change some value manually, if so go to bottom of the page to customize.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
CUSTOMIZING:

 1. BACK & FORWARD BUTTONS MARGINS.

> GO TO BOTTOM OF THE PAGE TO CUSTOMIZE
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Integrates with:
 MBlue Nav-Style (all styles)
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Updates:
 30.01.2009 Ver. 0.5.0 = added namespace, added more info
 28.09.2008 Ver. 0.4.1 = few fixes
 22.09.2008 Ver. 0.4.0 = better integration
 24.07.2008 Ver. 0.3.0 = small and big versions joined, buttons redesigned for better compression, code optimized
 13.07.2008 Ver. 0.1.0 = temp version
--------------------------------------------------------------------
24.07.2008 - OK I totally remade my Nav-Buttons styles, now this contains both small and large version, also better code compression.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
22.09.2008 - New version released. Should work with more themes.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
